This place rocks! We had a group of 12 and we shared a bunch of different tapas. The sangria was amazing... Not too sweet. The service where is your phone and they even brought us a free sampling of their acorn liquor. It was so delicious that three people bought a bottle of it. I bought two bottles of their red wine. €10 apiece! Oh, and one more thing... And the check does not include tip and there is no space for it so tell them how much to add ahead of time.
